3.21.17  6:28 am   Although I am very much looking forward to your next "history of" video, I think you should dedicate more time to your music. I listen to your songs all the time in the car, you just sound completely authentic and genuine and it really speaks to me and my friends think I'm crazy for being obsessed with you so much. I guess I don't really have a question, you can group me in the "don't understand" category if you feel like it, or not reply. Just please, keep pursuing music.

3.21.17  12:15 am   I see a lot of questions asking when is the next "history of" video. But the real question is, do you feel pressured to please the people who are constantly berating you, trying to find out when the video is coming out?

Or do you not care what others think, and care only to work at a pace that suits you? Or perhaps a combination of both?

3.21.17  12:11 am   I know the new vid is comin', so i will ask about something else. peanut butter song: you recorded the jar hits on to a MIDI track and then just moved the notes to form the major and then add 9 chords, right? It seems more practical than just playing chords in sync or trying to re-sync 'em. just that. keep it awesome and hellyeahish.
